metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39926 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Buffer overflow in the Bluetooth HCI_ISO dissector in Wireshark 3.4.0 to 3.4.9 allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-39926` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 3.6.7-1
libwireshark16 - 3.6.7-1
libwiretap13 - 3.6.7-1
libwsutil14 - 3.6.7-1
tshark - 3.6.7-1
wireshark - 3.6.7-1
wireshark-common - 3.6.7-1
wireshark-qt - 3.6.7-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wireshark package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.6.7-1').
